member.summary: Gets or sets required width of the control. This property is used for internal to arrange and measure the control.
member.remarks: PreferredWidth calculate the preferred width of the EditControl.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Edit.EditControl.DocumentSource
member.summary: Gets or sets source for EditControl. The filename specified will be loaded in the EditControl.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Edit.EditControl.ShowLineNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether line number to be displayed or not.

remarks.para: ShowLineNumber property checks the Line number visibility.

value.para: Set True if Line number has to be displayed; otherwise, false. By default it is set to true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Edit.EditControl.IsReadOnly

remarks.para: Set True if this read only has to be enabled; otherwise, false. By default, it is set to false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the intellisense mode. It supports two modes viz, Auto and Custom. In Auto mode, intellisense items are auto generated based on the language lexems, assembly references included. CursorLayer class is used as an adorner for cursor. The adorner gets invalidated when the caretposition property is changed.
CursorLayer class contains the Cursor properties like the cursor index, cursor line.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Edit.Languages
member.summary: Displays list of Languages supported by Essential Edit WPF

item.description: Represents plain text and syntax highlighting will not be applied the text in the EditControl.
Represents C# files and applies syntax highlighting and outlining based on the built - in language specification for C#.
Represents Visual Basic files and applies syntax highlighting and outlining based on the built - in language specification for Visual Basic.
Represents XAML files and applies syntax highlighting based on the built - in language specification for XAML.
Represents XML files and applies syntax highlighting based on the built - in language specification for XML.
Represents user defined files and applies syntax highlighting based on the user defined language configurations applied using CustomLanguage property of EditControl class.

Represents the SyntaxHighlighting to the text. The Keyword format color is applies to the text, which is located between start and end Text.
Represents the SyntaxHighlighting to the text. The Comment format color is applies to the text, which is located between start and end Text.
